summary_detail.value: An information meeting for the West Kootenai community will be held on Saturday, September 2nd at 7:30 pm at the Kootenai Store deck. There will be an update on the Caribou Fire status. Also, a representative from the Lincoln County Sherriff's Office will discuss evacuation

title: West Kootenai Public Meeting on 9/2 at 7:30 (Caribou Fire Wildfire)
